comments.body: I like the idea of having a dedicated `admission` package, but I think there is a better way to handle this abstraction that doesn't require pulling in `topologymanager`, `cpumanager`, etc. here. It's easier if I just propose a patch on top of this than try and explaining everything in text. I will send you something later today or tomorrow to see what you think.

Here it is as a diff to the tip of your PR:
https://github.com/klueska/kubernetes/compare/pr/101432%5E...pr/101432

Much of it is a "revert" of many of the changes you had to make to introduce your original package.

It is way nicer indeed. I thought about extending the `Error` interface somehow but I stopped short because I could only think of what would end up to be a poor man alternative of type assertion, and came with the approach I proposed. But your solution avoid that direction completely. I'll switch to your direction.
Can you use my `kklues@nvidia.com` email for the attribution please?
Sure thing; will push again soon anyway.
